CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Ability to customize Survey and Team Conversation email communications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Glint now offers the capability to customize text and macros in survey and Team Conversation email communications. Additionally, users can also customize their logos and use a custom sender domain to send out emails.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Ability to customize surveys & team conversations
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Glint now offers the capability to personalize surveys and team conversations. Additionally, users can customize their logo and sender domain.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Audit Search Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Audit Search Graph API
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
OldVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Add Images to Check-In Notes and Review Dashboards
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, users can attach images to check-in notes and dashboards in Viva Goals to better illustrate their ideas visually.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Add Images to Check-In Notes and Review Dashboards
OldVersion.description: With this capability, users can attach images to check-in notes and dashboards in Viva Goals to better illustrate their ideas visually.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Graph Grounded Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot for answers grounded in your work content from the Microsoft Graph—your chats, documents, meetings, and emails—beyond your active Excel workbook. If you’re analyzing a workbook and want to enhance your understanding using information from another source in your tenant, just ask Copilot in Excel.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Graph Grounded Chat
OldVersion.description: Ask Copilot for answers grounded in your work content from the Microsoft Graph—your chats, documents, meetings, and emails—beyond your active Excel workbook. If you’re analyzing a workbook and want to enhance your understanding using information from another source in your tenant, just ask Copilot in Excel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Notifications and Nudges in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can receive survey notifications and nudges in Teams

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Notifications and Nudges in Teams
OldVersion.description: Users can receive survey notifications and nudges in Teams

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
OldVersion.description: ,Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Shared mailbox support security group assignments on encrypted mail access in Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,Members in mail-enabled security group that are assigned to a shared mailbox can access encrypted mail directly using Outlook for Windows. Users can access encrypted mail with Do Not Forward or Encrypt-only protection.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Shared mailbox support security group assignments on encrypted mail access in Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: ,Members in mail-enabled security group that are assigned to a shared mailbox can access encrypted mail directly using Outlook for Windows. Users can access encrypted mail with Do Not Forward or Encrypt-only protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Webinars in GCC-High
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Webinars is available for GCC-High clouds. This includes similar functionality that is already available for worldwide multi-tenant, such as interactivity for up to 1,000 attendees, registration support,  co-organizer support, breakout rooms, attendee reporting, and Dynamics 365 marketing integration.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Webinars in GCC-High
OldVersion.description: Teams Webinars is available for GCC-High clouds. This includes similar functionality that is already available for worldwide multi-tenant, such as interactivity for up to 1,000 attendees, registration support,  co-organizer support, breakout rooms, attendee reporting, and Dynamics 365 marketing integration.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Enhancements to the DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: Mac DLP will have the following capabilities with these enhancements: Context Based Classification and Matched condition and short evidence for advanced classification.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Enhancements to the DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
OldVersion.description: Mac DLP will have the following capabilities with these enhancements: Context Based Classification and Matched condition and short evidence for advanced classification.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in webinars
OldVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Enhanced multiple action experience from Threat explorer
CurrentVersion.description: SecOps can take multiple actions such as purging emails, submissions, and Tenant-level block actions through a single wizard on the bulk of messages. In addition, Tenant-level block URL and File actions are now available directly from Threat explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Enhanced multiple action experience from Threat explorer
OldVersion.description: SecOps can take multiple actions such as purging emails, submissions, and Tenant-level block actions through a single wizard on the bulk of messages. In addition, Tenant-level block URL and File actions are now available directly from Threat explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in chat
CurrentVersion.description: The Files tab in chat is now ‘Shared’. The shared tab shows all the files and links that were sent in the chat, making it easier to find them- all in one place. Channels are not affected by this change.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in chat
OldVersion.description: The Files tab in chat is now ‘Shared’. The shared tab shows all the files and links that were sent in the chat, making it easier to find them- all in one place. Channels are not affected by this change.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
CurrentVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
CurrentVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar split view when surface is set to month view
CurrentVersion.description: When viewing multiple calendars in month view, users will be able to select "split view" to see those calendars displayed side by side. This feature will be available in new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Intune policy available for specific primary account in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This adds Intune policy in the new Outlook for Windows to a specific primary account based on Active Directory Primary SMTP address. This will ease the setup process for new managed devices and guarantee that company policies will always be respected. #newoutlookforwindows
